common_issues.title: PiecesOS and Desktop App Connection Issues
common_issues.description: Users are experiencing difficulties with PiecesOS and Desktop App communication, resulting in errors like "Connection closed before full header was received." This prevents features such as local LLM download and app launch. Troubleshooting involves checking logs, software versions, and ensuring proper installation.

related_issues.title: Non-dismissable overlay message.
related_issues.text:
Non-dismissable overlay message.
### Software

Desktop Application

### Operating System / Platform

Windows

### Your Pieces OS Version

v11.0.4

### Early Access Program

- [ ] Yes, this is related to an Early Access Program feature.

### Kindly describe the bug and include as much detail as possible on what you were doing so we can reproduce the bug.

My Pieces app launches at Windows startup (intended). Sometimes, (possibly after a background update?), this dialog appears on my desktop. I don't know what it means, exactly, but I cannot click "Ok" and there is no other way to dismiss it. My only option appears to be to restart the computer, which is often impractical. Please fix!

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/f231ef56-3d59-4e94-8cb5-2b54249900cc)
## GitHub Issue Summary

**Issue:** ThemePark reported an inability to open Pieces for Desktop after installing the latest PiecesOS 11.0 release.

**Key Points:**

* ThemePark's issue is similar to reported issues #546, #571, and #131.
* mack-at-pieces, a support team member, reached out for more information.

**Problems Identified:**

* Pieces for Desktop app not opening after installing PiecesOS 11.0.

**Solutions Proposed/Implemented:**

* mack-at-pieces requested information about ThemePark's Windows version and confirmation of installed software versions. 

**Current Status/Outcome:**

* Issue is still being investigated.
* No solution has been implemented yet.

**Additional Notes:**

* The provided resources may offer helpful information while the issue is being resolved.

**Summary:**

ThemePark reported an issue with Pieces for Desktop not opening after installing the latest PiecesOS update. The support team requested more information to diagnose the issue and has not yet provided a solution.

recommendations: **Investigate and resolve PiecesOS and Desktop App connection issues:** This appears to be the most common and impactful issue, hindering core features. Prioritize identifying the root cause and providing a solution.

**Improve communication around updates and installations:** The "Non-dismissable overlay message" suggests potential issues with update processes or user guidance. Provide clearer instructions and communication channels for updates.

**Enhance error messaging and logging:**  Error messages like "Connection closed before full header was received" are not user-friendly. Improve error messages to be more informative and actionable for both users and support teams. Ensure detailed logging to aid in troubleshooting.

**Consider a dedicated FAQ or troubleshooting guide for common issues:**  Given the recurrence of certain issues, creating readily accessible resources can reduce support volume and improve user experience.
